name: Virgil Scrolling Upwards
description:
Welcome to Virgil Scrolling Upwards!

Here it is! At long last! Your wait has come to an end? Yes. Maybe.

So this is somewhat of a first-time-development-prototype game I guess. An FTDP if you will. A Fun Time Doof Party. The first in it's genre.

It started out as a project for a school competition that got cancelled, but I worked on it for a couple of months as a one man development team and now you can check it out for yourself.

If you have a good time, consider donating. It would mean a lot, since I'm a student, and money and bus tickets, food and all that stuff.

If you have any issues, write them in the comments below, and hopefully we can solve those bad boys!

With all that said, I hope you enjoy the game, and see you in Part Two :)
